content.p: Associate Professor, I am primarily involved in the teaching in the following modules: 1. Biotechnology in Animal Physiology (BIOS3058) 2. Medical and Pharmaceutical Biotechnology (BIOS3081) 3. Applied Bioethics: Sustainable Food Production, Biotechnology and the Environment (BIOS3060) Targeting epigenetics for cancer therapy in invasive lobular carcinoma of the breast. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
